text: YOU ARE ON THE OUTSKIRTS OF THE TOWN
OF SEAGATE AT THE BOTTOM OF THE STAIRS
LEADING BACK TO THE CASTLE.
TOWN HALL
THE MAYOR IMPLORES YOU:
"THE FRONTIERS OF ALUSIA IS A LAND IN
PERIL. LOKTAR, AN EVIL RED DRAGON,
AND ITS MINIONS ARE RAPIDLY TAKING
CONTROL OF THE TRADE ROUTES AND RAI-
DING THE CASTLES. YOU MUST STOP THEM!"
GARGAMEL'S HOUSE
YOU MEET A WIZARD AND HIS CAT:
"FOR ARCANE TOMES GO TO:
HTTPS://ZIMLAB.COM/WIZARDRY
(IN LOWERCASE LETTERS)"
YE FIDDLE IN HAND INN
A DRUNKEN DERELICT BABBLES: "MAGIC
USERS CAN USE A TRUESILVER (TS) ITEM
AS IT DOES NOT IMPEDE MAGICAL MANA."
A FARMHOUSE
THE FARMER BEGS YOU:
"PLEASE, BRAVE HEROES, SAVE OUR WIVES,
CHILDREN, AND BABIES FROM EVIL!"
CEMETARY OF SEAGATE
THE SWEET RIDING PLAINS
THE FILGISO FOREST
CAVE ENTRANCE
A WARD PREVENTS YOUR PASSAGE.
ON THE REMAINS OF A POOR SOUL YOU FIND
A JOURNAL: "... COULD NOT GET THE
QUILL... PASSAGE DENIED... DYING FROM
WOUNDS... SHAME ON ME ALUSIA IS LOST!"
SEAGATE'S CATACOMBS
YOU HEAR THE CLATTER OF BONES...
SEAGATE'S UNDERGROUND PRISON
WATER'S EDGE. HOW WELL DO YOU SWIM?
YOU MEET THE LADY OF THE LAKE: "SEEK
THE STRONGEST WEAPON OF ALL, FOR IT
WILL HELP YOU DEFEAT THE GODS. SEEK
MERLIN FOR HE KNOWS ABOUT THEM."
YOU MEET MERLIN: "THE GODS YOU SAY?
MY FOOT! THESE PRETENDERS HAVE THEIR
HEADS SWOLLEN BY HAVING TOO MUCH
POWER!! A QUILL! A PLUME! A FEATHER!!
... CAN BE FOUND ON A CERTAIN ANIMAL."
HUGE BOULDERS BLOCK THE PASSAGE...
THERE MUST BE ANOTHER WAY THROUGH.
YOU FINALLY EMERGE FROM A LONG TUNNEL
ONTO THE SIDE OF A MOUNTAIN PLATEAU.
A HUGE NEST IS IN THE MIDDLE.
MOMMY BETTER NOT SHOW UP!
WIND IS PULLING YOU IN! YOU RESIST!!
ONE MORE STEP AND YOU'LL BE SUCKED IN!
YOU WOKE IT UP! IT IS PRODIGIOUS!!!
A MESSAGE ON A DEAD PIGEON READS:
"LOKTAR HAS KIDNAPPED MY DAUGHTER,
PRINCESS PERSIA. I BEG YOU, SAVE HER!
- KING GULTHALION OF ALUSIA"
IT IS SLEEPING. DARE YOU WAKE IT UP?
YOU SHIVER, YOU MAY ACTUALLY DIE HERE!
A TORNADO !!!
YOU MIRACULOUSLY FALL UNHURT IN THE
CENTER OF A VALLEY. STRONG WINDS SEND
DEBRIS FLYING ALL OVER THE PLACE!
CAREFUL,YOU'LL BE CAUGHT IN A TORNADO!
DEBRIS FLYING ALL OVER THE PLACE!
CAREFUL,YOU'LL BE CAUGHT IN A TORNADO!
YOU MEET SINBAD: "A SPECIAL SHIELD
PROTECTS AGAINST DEMONIC FORCES. FIND
IT, FOR IT WILL SERVE YOU WELL.
HAVE YOU SEEN MY SCIMITAR? I LOST IT."
YOU MEET BILBO BAGGINS: "TO GET TO
LOKTAR YOU MUST FIRST DEFEAT THE GODS
THAT ARE PROTECTING IT. ONLY THE ONE
TRUE RING LET ME ESCAPE THEM!"
YOU MEET CONAN THE BARBARIAN: "MIGHTY
WEAPONS AND ARMOR ARE HIDDEN EVERY-
WHERE,FIND THEM FOR YOU WILL NEED THEM
TO FIGHT THE FIENDS OF THE UNDERWORLD"
HE THEN DISMISSES YOU: "BY CROM, LEAVE
ME NOW FOR I HAVE A KINGDOM TO CONQUER
FOR MYSELF AND MY FUTURE QUEEN."
YOU FIND A SECRET PASSAGE!
YOU MEET LANCELOT: "I HAD THE KING'S
KEY, BUT DEADALUS STOLE IT FROM ME!"
YOU MEET HERCULES: "DEADALUS STOLE MY
RING, I AM NOW POWERLESS TO HELP YOU."
AN ENGRAVED STONE: "FORTUNATE IS THE
ONE WHO FOUND KING ARTHUR'S TREASURE.
BE POLITE, TAKE ONLY WHAT YOU NEED."
YOU STAND IN FRONT OF A DOOR. A GLOW
EMANATES FROM THE KEYHOLE.
A SINISTER LAUGHTER REVERBERATES: "YOU
WILL PAY WITH YOUR LIFE FOR DISTURBING
MY PRIVACY HA HA HAGH HAGH HAGHHHH..."
YOU FEEL A GHOSTLY PRESENCE...
YOU ENTER A PROTECTIVE PENTAGRAM.
A VOICE BOOMS OUT OF A 20 FEET
HUMANOID STATUE STANDING IN FRONT
OF YOU : "KNEEL BEFORE YOUR GOD!"
A PARCHMENT READS: THE TRUE NATURE OF
THE MYTHOLOGICAL GODS CAN BE UNCOVERED
IN THESE NUMBERS: 4 1 1 0 2 9 0 2
RUNES ON THE WALL READ: "YOU HAVE
DISCOVERED THE CHAMBER OF A
WELL-KNOWN REVENANT."
A GODLY BEING STANDS BEHIND GLASS
DOORS. DARE YOU DISTURB IT?
AN ADVENTURER PALE WITH FEAR RUNS BY
YOU: "REVENANTS... RUN !"
YOU MUST PAY TO ENTER THE TEMPLE.
A PARCHMENT READS: "THE TRUE NATURE
OF THE FALSE GODS CAN BE UNCOVERED
USING A MAGIC MIRROR."
YOU HAVE FOUND A SECRET PASSAGE!
I AM VERY PRECIOUS TO MIGHTY HERCULES
AND BILBO BAGGINS, WHAT AM I?
A SURPRISED, BUT NO LESS EVIL VOICE
INTONES: "WHAT? YOU MADE IT THIS FAR!
I WILL HAVE TO TAKE CARE OF YOU
MYSELF THEN... AND I WILL HAVE A FEW
OF MY FRIENDS JOIN THE PARTY, AND
I KNOW YOU LOVE THESE GUYS !!!"
A MALOR WARD ! ! !
AHEAD IS A DOOR WITH A DRAGON EMBLEM.
AN OMINOUS VOICE INTONES: "BY SETTING
FOOT ON MY DOMAIN YOU HAVE SHOWN TRUE
COURAGE. BUT YOUR BRAVADO DOES NOT
INTIMIDATE ME FOR I AM LOKTAR AND YOUR
AUDACITY WILL BE PUNISHED. I WILL SEND
MY HORDES UPON YOU. BE PREPARED
TO DIE! MOOHOOHAHAHAHAHA..."
YOU EMERGE INTO A DRAGON'S LAIR AND
SEE ONE OF THE BIGGEST, NASTIEST RED
DRAGON EVER. IT IS HOLDING A BEAUTIFUL
HUMANOID FEMALE FIGURE DRESSED IN
ROYAL GOWNS. LOKTAR CHALLENGES YOU:
"IF YOU COME ANY CLOSER, I WILL CRUSH
HER SPINE! MOOHOOHAHAHAHAHA..."
CRAACKK! LOKTAR BREAKS HER NECK IN A
SICKENING NOISE! YOU FIND HER DEAD.
LOKTAR MOCKS YOU: "YOU FAILED YOUR
QUEST MISERABLE VERMINS. NOW GO TELL
GULTHALION HOW LAMENTABLE YOU ARE!"
THE STENCH HERE IS AWFUL! IT IS THE
SMELL OF THE BIGGEST, NASTIEST,
THE OLDEST, AND MOST POWERFUL DRAGONS.
UNLIKE SOME OTHER WORLDS, THE DRAGONS
IN DRAGONQUEST ARE REALLY POWERFUL.
DO NET EVEN EXPECT TO WALK AROUND AND
LIVE TO TELL. WELCOME TO THE
DRAGON'S LAIR!
YOU FIND A BOOK OF TRUE NAMES:
LOKTAR RED DRAGON. CALORUS TITAN.
FRIGOROUS TITAN. KADORTO GOD.
A FRIENDLY GOLD DRAGON OFFERS SOME
KNOWLEDGE: "YOU PUNY LITTLE HUMANOIDS
MUST KNOW THAT THERE IS ONE TRUE GOD.
I WILL NOT REVEAL ITS NAME,THAT IS FOR
YOU TO DISCOVER, BUT I CAN TELL YOU
THAT ITS POWER IS GREAT AND THAT ITS
FAVORITE COLOR IS BLUE!"
A FRIGHT WARD ! ! !
YOU START TO PANIC ! ! !
YOU RUN IN TERROR ! ! !
YOU BEGIN YOUR DESCENT...
YOU HAVE REACHED THE BOTTOM OF A
GALLERY. YOU LOOK AROUND AND SEE
FUMES AND MOLTEN MAGMA SPLURGE OUT OF
THE GROUND. WELCOME TO HELL!!!
THIS IS A LIBRARY OF THE COLLEGE OF
NAMING INCANTATIONS. A NAMER IS ONE
WHO SPECIALIZES IN THE KNOWLEDGE OF
TRUE NAMES AND COUNTERSPELLS. A NAMER
CAN CONTROL AN ENTITY FOR WHICH THEY
KNOW THE TRUE NAME. COUNTERSPELLS
HELP ONE RESIST SPELLS AND MAGIC.
YOU FOUND A POOL OF 30% BLUE WATER.
